alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 3:46AM CST until February 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Champaign, Coles, Douglas, Edgar, and Vermilion Counties. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will taper off early this morning, then will re-develop across the area this afternoon. The snow will mix with freezing drizzle late this afternoon and evening before coming to an end.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
